allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Complete SRS website implementation

ðŸš€ Built world-class marketing website for Southwest Resume Services

Features:
- Next.js 15 (App Router) + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS
- Full responsive design (mobile-first)
- WCAG 2.2 AA accessibility compliant
- SEO optimized (metadata, sitemap, robots.txt)
- All pages implemented (Home, Services, Process, Results, About, FAQ, Contact)
- Research-backed content aligned with SOP
- Brand identity: Navy/Gold color palette from logo
- Reusable component library (Hero, ServiceGrid, FAQ, ContactForm, etc.)
- Clean architecture with strict TypeScript
- Performance optimized (Lighthouse 90+ target)

Pages:
- Home: Value proposition, services overview, Client Truth Principle
- Services: All 6 core services with quality standards
- Process: 10-step client journey with research methodology
- About: Philosophy, problem statement, Arizona connection
- Results: Client outcomes and differentiators
- FAQ: 16 comprehensive Q&A entries
- Contact: Form with clear next-steps guidance

Documentation:
- README.md: Technical setup and deployment guide
- OWNERS_MANUAL.md: Content management for non-technical users
- IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN.md: Detailed project architecture and phases

ðŸ¤– Generated with Claude Code

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash(then echo "VALID: Key is a JWT")
Bash(else echo "INVALID: Key is NOT a JWT \(should start with ''eyJ''\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Docs: Update documentation for SEO Phase 1 implementation

- CHANGELOG.md: Add 2025-12-23 SEO Phase 1 entry with all schema and metadata changes
- README.md: Expand SEO section with structured data table, local SEO details, link to SOP
- IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN.md: Mark SEO tasks as complete \(robots.txt, sitemap, canonical URLs, structured data, metadata\)
- SEO-GEO-LOCAL-SOP.md: Update to v1.1, add change log entry for Phase 1 implementation

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(# Check if there''s an existing Claude Code config cat ~/.claude/settings.json || echo ""No existing settings.json"" # Also check VS Code settings location ls -la ~/Library/Application\\ Support/Code/User/*.json)

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add HubSpot CRM integration and client management system

Features:
- Client management with CRM-style admin UI
- HubSpot bi-directional sync \(contacts & deals\)
- Webhook handler for HubSpot events
- Rate-limited API client with retry logic
- SQL migrations for clients and sync tables
- Supabase AI automation documentation

New files:
- lib/hubspot/* - HubSpot API client, sync service, webhook validator
- app/admin/clients/new - Client creation form
- app/api/admin/clients/* - Client CRUD APIs
- app/api/webhooks/hubspot - Webhook receiver
- docs/SUPABASE-AI-AUTOMATION.md - AI automation guide
- docs/HUBSPOT-INTEGRATION.md - Integration docs
- sops/* - Standard operating procedures

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

- 4 speculative future scenarios

matrices, imaginative scenarios, and SRS positioning analysis.
